info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 31 at 12:13AM PST until January 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s possible. * WHERE...In Arizona, Parker Valley. In California, Palo Verde Valley. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
